channel.title: What is that program?
channel.description:
my teacher told my about some chinesse guy that had 20 computers and their own screen, and all had wow installed. he used an auto thing to auto fight and earn 120m g a day and sold them for real money. the biggest money farm ive heard of.
ofc he got banned alot of times but he had 1000 wow games to make a new account.
does any1 know that program or anything like?

item.title: What is that program?

item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

[quote=“USMC, post:9, topic:72700”]probally using the glider bot.

http://www.wowglider.com/[/quote]

amazing thx.

you know any other+

Read full topic

item.title: What is that program?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Yea you’re right. I just remember hearing that it was Tokyo when it first became big with WoW. China has all the ‘peasants’, and there is an average $.50 minimum wage there (whereas Tokyo’s is about $5.50)

Read full topic

item.title: What is that program?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:5, topic:72700”]Actually, I think Tokyo was the biggest area of ‘gold farming’ for a while. I don’t know if it has changed, but they used to have a ridiculous number of unemployed citizens, thus resorting to crammed rooms of gold farming.
They were the first place to be exposed to the reality of making money while playing games.[/quote]

Tokyo? Rofl. Tokyo is one of the wealthiest cities in the world. China is where the peasants are.

Read full topic

item.title: What is that program?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Actually, I think Tokyo was the biggest area of ‘gold farming’ for a while. I don’t know if it has changed, but they used to have a ridiculous number of unemployed citizens, thus resorting to crammed rooms of gold farming.
They were the first place to be exposed to the reality of making money while playing games.

Read full topic

item.title: What is that program?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

These people are called gold farmers, and they are not macroers. They are people from poor countries, often China, who are used extremely cheaply to make gold in the game, and then sell it on.

Read full topic
